# LESSLINUX minimal configuration for sudo Defaults timestamp_timeout=0 Defaults env_reset
# User privilege specification root ALL=(ALL) ALL
# All users might shutdown, reboot or poweroff without password ALL ALL = NOPASSWD: /sbin/shutdown,\ /sbin/halt,\ /sbin/poweroff,\ /sbin/reboot,\ /static/sbin/shutdown,\ /static/sbin/halt,\ /static/sbin/poweroff,\ /static/sbin/reboot,\ /usr/libexec/xfsm-shutdown-helper # All users might unmount all filesystems without password ALL ALL = NOPASSWD: /bin/umount # All users might run lshw without password ALL ALL = NOPASSWD: /usr/sbin/lshw-static # All users might gain partion info with lshw without password ALL ALL = NOPASSWD: /usr/sbin/parted -s /dev/sd[a-z] unit B print # surfer might mount all filesystems surfer ALL = /bin/mount surfer ALL = /usr/sbin/mount.cifs # surfer might make directories surfer ALL = /bin/mkdir # surfer might refresh the device tree surfer ALL = NOPASSWD: /sbin/mdev # All users might update ClamAVs signatures ALL ALL = NOPASSWD: /opt/sbin/clam_update # surfer might trigger the firefox and thunderbird wrappers # without password surfer ALL = NOPASSWD: /opt/firefox/bin/firefox_smack surfer ALL = NOPASSWD: /opt/firefox35/bin/firefox_smack # surfer might trigger updates, but this needs a password surfer ALL = NOPASSWD: /etc/lesslinux/updater/updater.sh # surfer might switch softlinks for ff addon installation # not necessary, do it with directory ownership # surfer ALL = NOPASSWD: /usr/bin/ll_ff_allow_install,\ # /usr/bin/ll_ff_prevent_install surfer ALL = NOPASSWD: /usr/bin/ll_ff_enable_flash,\ /usr/bin/ll_ff_disable_flash
#includedir /etc/sudoers.strict.d

# LESSLINUX minimal configuration for sudo Defaults timestamp_timeout=0 Defaults env_reset
# User privilege specification root ALL=(ALL) ALL
# All users might shutdown, reboot or poweroff without password ALL ALL = NOPASSWD: /sbin/shutdown,\ /sbin/halt,\ /sbin/poweroff,\ /sbin/reboot,\ /usr/libexec/xfsm-shutdown-helper # All users might unmount all filesystems without password ALL ALL = NOPASSWD: /bin/umount # All users might run lshw without password ALL ALL = NOPASSWD: /usr/sbin/lshw-static # All users might gain partion info with lshw without password ALL ALL = NOPASSWD: /usr/sbin/parted -s /dev/sd[a-z] unit B print # surfer might mount all filesystems surfer ALL = NOPASSWD: /bin/mount surfer ALL = NOPASSWD: /usr/sbin/mount.cifs # surfer might make directories surfer ALL = NOPASSWD: /bin/mkdir # surfer might refresh the device tree surfer ALL = NOPASSWD: /sbin/mdev # surfer might start/stop the SSH daemon surfer ALL = NOPASSWD: /etc/rc.d/0600-openssh.sh # All users might update ClamAVs signatures ALL ALL = NOPASSWD: /opt/sbin/clam_update # surfer might trigger the firefox and thunderbird wrappers # without password surfer ALL = NOPASSWD: /opt/firefox/bin/firefox_smack surfer ALL = NOPASSWD: /opt/firefox35/bin/firefox_smack # surfer might trigger updates, but this needs a password surfer ALL = NOPASSWD: /etc/lesslinux/updater/updater.sh # surfer might switch softlinks for ff addon installation # not necessary, do it with directory ownership # surfer ALL = NOPASSWD: /usr/bin/ll_ff_allow_install,\ # /usr/bin/ll_ff_prevent_install ##### THIS IS DANGEROUS surfer ALL = NOPASSWD: /usr/bin/passwd surfer ALL = NOPASSWD: /usr/bin/Terminal surfer ALL = NOPASSWD: /usr/bin/Thunar
#includedir /etc/sudoers.lax.d

#!/static/bin/ash
#lesslinux provides sudo #lesslinux license BSD
PATH=/static/bin:/static/sbin:/bin:/sbin:/usr/bin:/usr/sbin export PATH
. /etc/rc.defaults . /etc/rc.subr/extractbootparams . /etc/rc.subr/colors
case $1 in start) if [ "$laxsudo" -gt 0 ] ; then cp /etc/sudoers.lax /etc/sudoers else cp /etc/sudoers.strict /etc/sudoers fi chmod 0440 /etc/sudoers if [ "$allowsudosu" -gt 0 ] ; then printf "$bold===> Adjusting sudo $normal\n" echo '' >> /etc/sudoers echo '# added by /etc/rc.d/0505-sudo.sh' >> /etc/sudoers echo 'surfer ALL = /bin/su' >> /etc/sudoers fi ;; esac
